span.span: The channel to be used to connect to the service.

summary.span: 提供用于创建可调用服务的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 客户端对象的基实现。

span.span: Provides the base implementation used to create Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client objects that can call services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展 类，以创建可用于连接到服务的自定义 WCF 客户端对象。Extend the class to create a custom WCF client object that can be used to connect to a service. 通常情况下，WCF 客户端基类由一种工具进行扩展，例如，用户的 [元数据实用工具工具 ( # A0) ](/dotnet/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe) 。Typically, the WCF client base class is extended by a tool such as the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](/dotnet/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe) on your behalf. 有关示例，请参见“示例”一节。For an example, see the Example section. 有些开发人员喜欢使用对象而不喜欢使用接口和 类，那么他们就可以方便快捷地使用 类。The class can be used quickly and easily by developers who prefer objects to the use of the interfaces and the class. 在任何情况下，此类都会包装或公开 类和 接口的方法和功能。In all cases this class wraps or exposes the methods and functionality of the class and the interface. 比如在使用 类时，您可以在进行任何调用或调用 之前创建类并修改终结点、通道工厂或安全信息。As when using the class, you can create the class and modify the endpoint, channel factory, or security information prior to making any calls or calling . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Wcf 客户端概述](/dotnet/framework/wcf/wcf-client-overview) 和 [使用 Wcf 客户端访问服务](/dotnet/framework/wcf/accessing-services-using-a-wcf-client)。For more information, see [WCF Client Overview](/dotnet/framework/wcf/wcf-client-overview) and [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](/dotnet/framework/wcf/accessing-services-using-a-wcf-client). 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 将清理代码加入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是加入析构函数中。Put your clean-up code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用析构函数：它们会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非引用成员：它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 和终结器本身，以便模拟自动生成的 行为。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 [ ( # A0) ](/dotnet/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe) 扩展 类，以创建 WCF 客户端类。The following code example shows how the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](/dotnet/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe) extends the class to create a WCF client class. [!code-csharp[ClientBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/clientbase/cs/clientbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClientBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/clientbase/vb/clientbase.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用从应用程序配置文件中的终结点信息创建 WCF 客户端对象。Use to create a WCF client object from the endpoint information in the application configuration file. 该构造函数的主要功能是创建 ，其中类型参数为目标服务协定的类型。The main function of the constructor is to create a where the type parameter is the type of the target service contract.

summary.span: 使用应用程序配置文件中的默认目标终结点初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default target endpoint from the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建 WCF 客户端对象来调用服务。Use this constructor to create a WCF client object to invoke a service. 此构造函数使用类型参数（目标协定的类型）和应用程序配置文件中的绑定和地址信息。This constructor uses the type parameter as the target contract and the binding and address information from the application configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示客户端如何在扩展 `SampleServiceClient` 类的 类中使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how a client uses this constructor in a `SampleServiceClient` class that extends the class. [!code-csharp[ServiceContractAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicecontractattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ServiceContractAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicecontractattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]

exception.span: 配置文件中没有默认的终结点信息，或者文件中有多个终结点，或者没有配置文件。

span.span: Either there is no default endpoint information in the configuration file, more than one endpoint in the file, or no configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数传递实现目标服务的回调协定的服务对象，并通过客户端应用程序配置文件确定目标终结点信息。Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service and determine the target endpoint information from the client application configuration file. 目标值通过查找 `name` 客户端[ < 终结点 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client)元素的属性找到。The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client) element.

span.span: The endpoint cannot be found or the endpoint contract is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数传递实现目标服务的回调协定的服务对象，并从应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称中确定目标终结点信息， (通过查找 `name`) 和指定地址的客户端[ < 终结点 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client)元素的属性来查找目标值。Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service and determine the target endpoint information from the name of the endpoint in an application configuration file (The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client) element) and the specified address.

param.name: instance

span.span: The address of the service.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数传递实现目标服务的回调协定的服务对象，并从应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称中确定目标终结点信息， (通过查找 `name`) 和指定地址的客户端[ < 终结点 > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client)元素的属性来查找目标值。Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service and determine the target endpoint information from the name of the endpoint in an application configuration file (The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client) element) and the specified address.

exception.span: 回叫实例 或 为 。

span.span: The callback instance, , or is .

exception.span: 无法找到终结点或者终结点协定无效。

span.span: The endpoint cannot be found or the endpoint contract is not valid.

span.span: Instructs the inner channel to display a user interface if one is required to initialize the channel prior to using it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在构造通道之前内部通道需要用户的交互，请调用 方法。Call the method if the inner channel requires user interaction prior to constructing the channel. 例如，如果用户必须输入用户名和密码以确保通道安全，则可以通过调用此方法来调用自定义的 。For example, if a user must enter a username and password to secure the channel, that custom can be invoked by calling this method.

param.name: userState
param.span: 要与异步调用关联的 对象。

span.span: The object to associate with the asynchronous call.

summary.span: 为实现基于事件的异步模式提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for implementing the event-based asynchronous pattern.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅基于事件的异步模式概述。

span.span: For more information about this pattern, see Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 `userState` 参数中，为各个 调用提供一个唯一值（如 GUID 或哈希代码），这样，当各个操作完成时，你的事件处理程序便可以确定是哪个操作的实例引发了完成事件。Provide a unique value, such as a GUID or hash code, in the `userState` parameter for each call to , and when each operation is completed, your event handler can determine which instance of the operation raised the completion event.
